item.title: MIUI V13.0.1.0.SCURUXM Fastboot update for Redmi Note 8 (2021) Russia
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Redmi Note 8 (2021) Russia

[System]
Stable MIUI based on Android 12

[More features and improvements]

Optimization: Mind map nodes are more convenient and intuitive now
